chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> 0 < i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x <> x

Premises:
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0 => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
dart = nat : Set
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
MA0.degree = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => MA0.degree_aux m z 1 : fmap -> dart -> nat
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Module MF : Sig Definition f : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition f_1 : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McF.f m z). Definition exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McF.f_1 m z). Definition bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cF_L1_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x = Iter (cF m) i x
degree_y0_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in MF.degree m y0 = MF.degree m y_1
expf_y0_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m y0 y_1
cF_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let x10 := cF_1 m x in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let m1 := L m one x y in cF m1 z = (if eq_dart_dec y0 z then x else if eq_dart_dec x10 z then y_1 else cF m z)
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
between_expf_L0_4_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y ->...-> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_CN_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z ->...-> expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
between_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in betweenf m x_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
between_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_L0_CN_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z ->...-> betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t
nf_L_B_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nf m1 = match k with | zero => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in (nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1))%Z | one => let y0 := cA m0 zero y...
not_expf_expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf (L m zero x y) y x0
expf_not_expf_L0_CV : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf (L m zero x y) y x0 -> ~ expf m x_1 y
expf_expf_L0_3_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_expf_L0_4_bis_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m y_0_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_not_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf m x_1 y < -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) y x0
expf_expf_L0_4_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) y z
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
expf_L0_x0_y_0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in expf (L m zero x y) x0 y_0_1
MF.degree_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.degree m z in 0 < p /\ Iter (MF.f m) p z = z /\ (forall i : nat, 0 < i < p -> Iter (MF.f m) i z <> z)
expf_expf_L0_2_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_6 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y t -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
between_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_y_x_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf (L m zero x y) y x_1
Iter_cF_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> Iter (cF (I m x u p)) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
expf_L0_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z ->...-> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1...

expf_L0_5 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
expf_L0_CNS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t <-> (let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x...
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
MF.degree_diff : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> forall i : nat, 0 < i < MF.degree m z -> Iter (MF.f m) i z <> z
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
cF_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec x0 z then y_0_1 else cF m z)
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y

```coq
intros m x y i IHn.
unfold Iter.
rewrite cF_L1_x_x10.
auto.
